mission.title: Who We Are
mission.description: StudyFrontier is an international education consulting agency based in Kenitra, Morocco. We provide ethical, legal guidance to students seeking admission to accredited U.S. universities. Our mission is to make the application process transparent, manageable, and grounded in realistic expectations.

integrity.title: Ethical Standards
integrity.description: We adhere to all applicable education consulting regulations and operate with complete transparency.

expertise.title: Professional Guidance
expertise.description: Our team provides informed guidance based on experience with U.S. university admissions processes.

partnership.title: Student Support
partnership.description: We support students throughout the application process, from initial consultation to enrollment.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We provide personalized consulting to each student based on their academic profile, financial circumstances, and educational goals. We believe in honest assessments and realistic pathways.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: End-to-End Support for Your Study Abroad Journey

consultation.title: Initial Consultation
consultation.description: We begin with a comprehensive assessment of your academic background, goals, and financial situation. This helps us identify suitable universities and programs for your profile.

university.title: University Selection & Applications
university.description: Guidance on choosing appropriate institutions and preparing applications. We help you present your qualifications effectively to admissions committees.

admission.title: Admission Support
admission.description: From essays to recommendation letters, we ensure every element of your application meets U.S. standards and showcases your potential.

visa.title: F-1 Visa Preparation
visa.description: Comprehensive preparation for your visa interview, including documentation review, mock interviews, and embassy procedures guidance.

pathway.title: Pathway Programs
pathway.description: For students who need additional English language preparation or academic foundation, we connect you with accredited pathway programs designed for international student success.

predeparture.title: Pre-Departure Guidance
predeparture.description: Orientation on living in the U.S., housing options, cultural adaptation, and what to expect in your first semester.

q1.question: Do you guarantee university admission?
q1.answer: We do not make guarantees. We provide professional guidance to help you prepare strong applications based on your qualifications and our experience with U.S. university admissions processes.

q2.question: Do you guarantee visa approval?
q2.answer: No. Visa decisions are made solely by the U.S. Embassy. We prepare you thoroughly for the interview and ensure your documentation is complete and accurate.

q3.question: What are your fees?
q3.answer: Our consulting fees vary based on the services you need. Contact us for a personalized consultation and transparent pricing structure.

q4.question: Which universities do you work with?
q4.answer: We partner with accredited U.S. universities across multiple states. The right institution depends on your academic profile, budget, and career goals.

q5.question: How long does the process take?
q5.answer: From initial consultation to university enrollment, the process typically takes 6-12 months, depending on application deadlines and visa processing times.

q6.question: Do you help with English language requirements?
q6.answer: Yes. We can connect you with pathway programs and ESL institutions if you need to improve your English before starting your degree program.
